content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed "execute_python_file" on "average.py" twice and received the result, "The average of the numbers is: 3.0" both times. I wrote "This is some new text." to a file called "new_file.txt". I read the contents of "productive_things_to_do.txt" which includes a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored and an article on overcoming the planning fallacy. I appended "This is a new log entry." and "This is a new log entry." to "file_logger.txt" twice, and then replaced the first occurrence of "This is a new log entry." with "This is a modified log entry." in "file_logger.txt". I attempted to delete "file_logger.txt", but received an error message that it had already been deleted. I listed the files in the current directory twice. I read the contents of "example.txt" and received "new text" as a result. I successfully deleted "example.txt". I attempted to replace the first occurrence of "old text" with "new text" in "example.txt" but received an error message that the file does not exist. I executed "execute_python_code" with the code "print('Hello, World!')" and received "Hello, World!\n" as a result. I executed "execute_shell" with the command "ls -l" and received a list of files in the current directory as a result. I read the contents of "productive_things_to_do.txt" and appended "Appended text." to "file_logger.txt". I replaced the first occurrence of "Appended text." with "Replaced text." in "file_logger.txt". I attempted to delete "file_logger.txt" again, but received an error message that it had already been deleted. I listed the files in the current directory again. I executed "execute_python_file" on "average.py" and received the result, "The average of the numbers is: 3.0". I read the contents of "productive_things_to_do.txt" and appended "This is a new log entry." to "file_logger.txt". I replaced the first occurrence of "This is a new log entry." with "This is a modified log entry." in "file_logger.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
